title: The Bloody Origins of Israel’s Cyber Security Industry
description: Israel is a small country - yet its cyber security industry is exceptionally successful. In this episode, we go back to the Yom Kippur War of 1973, to discover how a national trauma and an Intelligence failure paved the way for Israel to become a cyber security mini-empire.
